meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Phlox, typically with showy flowers.
meanings.sent1: The phlox in the garden bloomed beautifully.
meanings.sent2: I planted some phlox in my backyard for its colorful flowers.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash under the phlox.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a field of phlox, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the phlox filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.sent1: She decided to phlox some new flowers in the empty pots.
meanings.sent2: We phloxed the garden with different varieties of phlox.
meanings.sent3: The kids playfully pretended to phlox a magical garden in the backyard.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to phlox hope in the hearts of the listeners.
meanings.sent5: The community came together to phlox a beautiful garden for everyone to enjoy.
